column4: Hi! 15 minutes after my Ubuntu Desktop 9.10 x64 has been on, the screen goes black. The adapter turns off. Have to restart to get it to come back on. Any ideas?
tried changing the power management options so the screen doesnt blank ?
Yes. Turned off the screen saver and powermanagement.
im out of ideas, probably use your excellent and much sought after googleFu mastery to find relevant information on ubuntu forums ?
